tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have been visiting Dr Gunjan Patel from past 8 - 10 years, for dental care like Root Canal, Tooth Extraction, Gap Filling etc. I like his presentation & way he explain regarding treatment, His charges are economical & handles patients with care. I wish him all the best.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Gunjan & his wife Dr Shlesha, both are very friendly. They both explained the problem I was facing and treated me utmost care. The procedure was not at all painful. They are also pocket friendly. I would recommend them for any dental problems. My father who is 88 years is also their patient.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: overall this Doctor couple give  the best service. They are the most  cautious in terms of Hygiene and they make sure the patient is well informed and they recommend  the best fit treatment .  Cost wise its a transparent process  and hence the patient in well aware of how much it would cost and is free to make changes depending on how much they  can spend.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Very friendly. Handled the root canal and fillings so perfectly. Had no problem keeping my mouth open for long time. Absolutely no discomfort while the fillings or rootcanal treatment was going on. Fully recommend doctor. *** ****** ********* **** ******** **** * ********

review: Gunjan explains everything he is doing before doing it and makes sure you are comfortable before moving ahead. Also allows for time between treatment to take a pause at the right times. Very efficient competent and friendly dentist!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr Gunjan is an excellent dentist and he takes care of the patient very well and puts them at ease which helps the patient to co-operate during the treatment. Thanks doctor

review: Excellent service. Explained the cause of pain in detail. Good equipment. Following all covid protocols.  Good care and easy solutions to heal oral problems. Friendly and very polite.
